00029 #ifdef RLWIN32
00030 
00031 #include <windows.h>
00032 #include <winbase.h>

00034 #include <string.h>
00035 
00036 #ifndef _WRAPTHREAD_
00037 #ifndef _WTHREAD_H_
00038 typedef unsigned long int pthread_t;
00039 
00040 /* Attributes for threads */
00041 typedef struct __sched_param
00042 {
00043   int sched_priority;
00044 }SCHED_PARAM;
00045 
00046 typedef struct
00047 {
00048   int     __detachstate;
00049   int     __schedpolicy;
00050   struct  __sched_param __schedparam;
00051   int     __inheritsched;
00052   int     __scope;
00053   size_t  __guardsize;
00054   int     __stackaddr_set;
00055   void   *__stackaddr;
00056   size_t  __stacksize;
00057 }pthread_attr_t;
00058 
00059 typedef HANDLE pthread_mutex_t;
00060 //old typedef CRITICAL_SECTION pthread_mutex_t;
00061 typedef long             pthread_mutexattr_t;
00062 #endif
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 #else  /* VMS or UNIX */
00066 #include <pthread.h>
00067 #endif /* end of MSWINDOWS */
00068 
00069 #ifndef _WRAPTHREAD_
00070 #ifndef _WTHREAD_H_
00071 typedef struct
00072 {
00073 #ifdef RLWIN32

00075   HANDLE hSemaphore;
00076 #else
00077   int              cmax;
00078   int              nready;
00079   pthread_mutex_t  mutex;
00080   pthread_cond_t   cond;
00081 #endif
00082 }WSEMAPHORE;
00083 #endif
